publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5881 Willie Coffey: Congratulations to Kilmarnock College—That the Parliament warmly congratulates Kilmarnock College on its recent very positive report from Her Majesty’s Inspectorate of Education (HMIE) following the external HMIE review that took place in November 2009; notes that the college received outstanding feedback, with four confidence statements relating to the key principles of high quality learning, learner engagement, learner progress and leadership; recognises this as a tremendous achievement for Principal Heather Dunk, who took up position in October 2008, and the dedicated staff of the college; acknowledges the support provided to the college by the Scottish Government and East Ayrshire Council, and is delighted with the college’s successful transformation under Heather Dunk’s leadership.
S3M-5881 Congratulations to Kilmarnock College (lodged on 3 March 2010) Cathy Jamieson*, Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-5881 Willie Coffey: Congratulations to Kilmarnock College—That the Parliament warmly congratulates Kilmarnock College on its recent very positive report from Her Majesty’s Inspectorate of Education (HMIE) following the external HMIE review that took place in November 2009; notes that the college received outstanding feedback, with four confidence statements relating to the key principles of high quality learning, learner engagement, learner progress and leadership; recognises this as a tremendous achievement for Principal Heather Dunk, who took up position in October 2008, and the dedicated staff of the college; acknowledges the support provided to the college by the Scottish Government and East Ayrshire Council, and is delighted with the college’s successful transformation under Heather Dunk’s leadership. Supported by: Cathy Jamieson, Jamie Hepburn
S3M-5881 Congratulations to Kilmarnock College (lodged on 3 March 2010) Michael Matheson*
S3M-5881 Congratulations to Kilmarnock College (lodged on 3 March 2010) Bob Doris*, Rob Gibson*, John Wilson*, John Scott*, Aileen Campbell*, Bill Kidd*, Sandra White*, Linda Fabiani*
S3M-5881 Congratulations to Kilmarnock College (lodged on 3 March 2010) Stuart McMillan*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-5881 Congratulations to Kilmarnock College (lodged on 3 March 2010) Angela Constance*
S3M-5881 Congratulations to Kilmarnock College (lodged on 3 March 2010) Maureen Watt*
